All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ActuatorConfig
A configuration class that activates the httpExchanges actuator.
AttractionNearUserDto
A class which creates the DTO (Data Transfer Object) AttractionNearUserDto.
HandlerInterceptorImpl
A class that implements WebMvcConfigurer, a native Spring MVC class.
InternalUsersInitializer
A class that temporarily manages a set of data internally, while waiting for a DBMS to be implemented.
InternalUsersQuantity
A class that initializes a constant that defines the number of users to be internally simulated.
IRewardService
RewardService interface that abstracts it from its implementation in order to achieve better code modularity in compliance with SOLID principles.
ITourGuideService
TourGuideService interface that abstracts it from its implementation in order to achieve better code modularity in compliance with SOLID principles.
ModuleConfig
A configuration class that contains Beans for the modules.
NearbyAttractionDto
A class which creates the DTO (Data Transfer Object) NearbyAttractionDto.
Preferences
A model class which creates the POJO (Plain Old Java Object) Preferences.
Reward
A model class which creates the POJO (Plain Old Java Object) Reward.
RewardService
A service class which performs the business processes relating to the user rewards system.
TourguideApplication
The main class of the application.
TourGuideController
A class that receives requests made from some specific URL which parameter is always the user's name.
TourGuideService
A service class which performs the business processes relating to the user location and reward system.
UriToIgnore
Constants class that regroups a short list of URI that the logger should ignore.
User
A model class which creates the POJO (Plain Old Java Object) User.
UserLocationDto
A class which creates the DTO (Data Transfer Object) UserLocationDto.
UsersTracker
A class that manages a tracker that follows users to record their positions and update rewards every N minutes.
WebMvcConfigurerImpl
A class that implements WebMvcConfigurer, a native Spring MVC class.
